item.description:
the revolution against corruption is at full speed, lets support the great Anna and all the people who are supporting him. if he can fast for a week, the least we can do is to spend a little time supporting his cause.

 

so come on guys and gals, lets do it for India.

The Pit, Harvard Square, Cambridge. Its on MBTA Red Line Train Station(Towards Alewife Station), Harvard Square. Just come out of the train station towards John F Kennedy Street exit. Please join us for this Biggest protest in the Greater Boston Area in front of Harvard. Please spread the word.
item.how_to_find_us: look for a lot of indians else call me 760-814-3832
item.name: IAC Organizing the Biggest demonstration @Harvard, Cambridge
